edit_error_all_titles_empty: Either original or localized title must be entered.
edit_error_max_progress_less_than_actual: Max progress value is smaller than progress value.

filter_ongoing_desc: Things that are expected to have new max progress in time.

statistics_weekday_title: Progress on each day of the week (last 3 months)
